nodes.text: Hayar was a male Mandalorian who resided in the planet Mandalore in 19 BBY.

Shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire when an Imperial garrison was established on Mandalore, Hayar and his companion Jarkyc managed to convince the Imperial garrison commander that a failed theme park, built by Hayar's brother, was a sacred Mandalorian temple. Intending to inspire awe among the local populace, the theme park was bought by the Empire which was used as their garrison base.
